name: Feast of hell
description:
Use your brain and your reflexes to feed the divine Yhom with hell fiends.

The apetite of Yhom is changing, beware because feeding him with unwanted food will cause your eternal damnation.

Fest of Hell is a top down action shooter with a good amount of tower defense elements.
Move, shoot, use various weapons but remember, not everything has to die.

________
Inputs :

Mouse Left Click : Shoot

Mouse wheel : Change weapon ( 4 weapons )
OR 1 2 3 4 keys for switch weapons

Z Q S D : Movement

ESC : Pause in game

/!\ Game need 1920x1080 screen resolution for the best experience :)
